string.text: Assault Territory for the Military
%s from %s assigned you to lead an assault to clear out any unauthorized individuals.

The commander is concerned about the rising number of incursions into the Zone. He wants you to go in and sweep an area for unauthorized personnel. Keep alert for any friendlies, but anyone else you see you are cleared to shoot on sight.
Great job. Keep it up you'll be in line for a commendation.
Capture Territory for the Military
You have been ordered by %s from %s to capture territory within the Zone.
Our unit has been tasked with pushing further into the Zone. The commander is looking for volunteers to capture territory for us. Can I inform him of your cooperation?
The task is done? Good job. I'll inform the commander right away of your success.
Capture Enemy Target for the Military
%s from %s assigned you a hostile target to capture or kill.
HQ has a list of of most wanted individuals in the Zone. If you can get to any of them, there will be a bonus in your next paycheck. Are you up for the job?
Outstanding work! The commander will be pleased.
Find %s for Military Mechanics
%s are required by Military mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Military mechanic if you find any.
Hey, can I ask you a favour? If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.

We are in dire need of new tools, since we haven't received enough funds from the Ministry of Defence to procure better equipment. For now, we need a new set of basic tools. You find some, and we will all be grateful. By the way, you don't have to bring it back to me, any military mechanic will do. Do that, and we will all offer you a discount from here on out. Will you do it?
Great! You brought exactly what we've asked. Thanks.
Find %s for Military Mechanics
%s are required by Military mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Military mechanic if you find any.
Alright, If you are up for it, I need more tools. But they may be a bit harder to find. Can you do this for me?
OK, now we need a new set of advanced tools. Bring some back, and we will even offer you a bigger discount.
Great! Come back any time if you need me to take a look at your gear.
Find %s for Military Mechanics
%s are required by Military mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Military mechanic if you find any.
Alright, If you are up for it, I need more tools. But they may be a bit harder to find. Can you do this for me?
Now we need a new set of expert tools. That should contain everything we need for now. Bring some back, and you will get an even bigger discount from us.
Great! Come back any time if you need me to take a look at your gear.
Protect Duty Territory
Hostile forces are encroaching on Duty territory. %s from %s has asked you to eliminate the threat.
I have been informed that enemy forces are advancing on one of our camps. I need you to stop them before they get there.
Excellent work. You are a fine warrior.
Reclaim Duty Territory
You have been tasked to recapture territory for Duty. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
I have an important mission available. Freedom has taken over one of our camps and I need a specialist to reclaim it.
The task is done? Good job.
Assassinate VIP for Duty
%s from %s has ordered you to find and eliminate a target.

I have a list of VIPs that need...taken care of. Some are informants, high-ranking Freedom members, squad leaders, tacticians or just plain scum. Extract information if you can, otherwise kill-on-sight.
Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised.
Find %s for Duty Mechanics
%s are required by Duty mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Duty mechanic if you find any.
I can really use a good set of tools, stalker...and maybe some money. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I am looking for.

Most of the repairing tools we have date back to 2006, when the second incident happened. Long before Duty even existed. We had to scavenge what equipment was left from the Military. Long story short, we need a new set of basic tools. Bring it back to any Duty mechanic you encounter and we will offer you a discount. Are you up for the task?
Nice work. We'll give you a good discount for bringing these tools.
Find %s for Duty Mechanics
%s are required by Duty mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Duty mechanic if you find any.
Hey, dude, if you happen to find some more advanced tools I will give you a discount. Will you keep a lookout for me?
Now we need a new set of advanced tools. Bring one set and we will offer you a bigger discount from here on out.
That's great. We'll give you a bigger discount for bringing these tools.
Find %s for Duty Mechanics
%s are required by Duty mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Duty mechanic if you find any.
Hey, dude, if you happen to find some more advanced tools I will give you a discount. Will you keep a lookout for me?
Now we need a new set of expert tools. That should contain everything we need for now. If you can bring some back we will offer you an even bigger discount.
Excellent! Now we have everything we need, thanks a lot stalker. Enjoy your discounts.
Eliminate Target for Bandits
Find and eliminate the target then return to %s from %s for payment.

There are many people in the Zone who have rubbed me the wrong way or shown me disrespect. Some of these pricks either owe me money or fucked up some deal. These people are nothing but rats that need stomped out. If you are up for the task, I will give you their information so that you can track them through GPS.
Great work! Here's a little something for your trouble:
Eliminate Mutant Threat for Bandits
Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.

We've been looking for someone with enough balls to clear out mutants in a few places. Stalkers aren't coming around here because they are too afraid. If we don't do something about it we won't have anyone left to 'borrow' any goods from, then we will have to move out of this territory.
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Eliminate Enemy Threat for Bandits
You have been tasked to eliminate a territorial threat within the area. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
Bitches are moving into our territory. The boss gave me orders to recruit a low life with enough balls to reclaim some of these camps. What do you say? Do you have enough hair on your chest?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Chiki-Briki i v Damke
%s from %s tasked you get the upper hand on local stalkers by relieving them of their valuables long enough until your band of merry men are satisfied.
There are a few guys who are looking for another to join up with them for a while. They need a scout to take them out looking for prime targets and will pay you once your job is done.
Nice take, eh? Here is your cut.
Hit Man
%s from %s has contracted you to run a hit. Find and eliminate the target then return to him for payment.
I have a list of people who have rubbed me the wrong way. I want you to rub them out. What do you say?
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Find %s for Bandit Mechanics
%s are required by Bandit mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Bandit mechanic if you find any.
I'm in desperate need of new tools, man. I can't do anything with the rusty shit I have and I'm running out of gun oil. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.

We need better tools, yo. It's pretty fucking hard to search for them when every motherfucker in the Zone is shooting us on sight. For now, we just need a new set of basic tools. You find one, bring it back to any of our mechanics and we will even offer you a discount from here on out. You up for it, dude?
Perfect! This is just what we need, man. I will talk to the other mechanics to give you a discount.
Find %s for Bandit Mechanics
%s are required by Bandit mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Bandit mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, here is some money. I spoke to the other mechanics to give you an even bigger discount.
Find %s for Bandit Mechanics
%s are required by Bandit mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Bandit mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. That should contain everything we need for now. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, now we have everything we need. We'll give you another discount for your work.
Contract Killer
You have been contracted to find and eliminate a target. Return to %s in %s for payment when the task is complete.
Our contractor has a list of outstanding bounties. We need volunteers to carry out these hits discretely, which will allow us to fulfil our obligations to our contractor. Are you interested?
It is done? Great. Here is your percentage:
Assault Territory for the Mercenaries
Clear the area of any and all hostile threats. Return to %s in %s for payment when the task is complete.
I need you to be point man on an assault. Clear the target area of any and all hostile forces.
Excellent work. You are a fine warrior.
Find %s for Mercenary Mechanics
%s are required by Mercenary mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Mercenary mechanic if you find any.
I have a proposition for you. If you can bring me some new tools, you will receive payment. Are you up for it?

Good. We've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some oil and tools that we need to do work on firearms. We will pay you for one of these toolkits if you can bring a full set back to any of our mechanics, including me. For every new set of tools you bring, we will reduce the prices for our services as a token of our gratitude. So, what do you say? You gonna help us?.
Right, on. This is what we've been looking for, thanks!
Find %s for Mercenary Mechanics
%s are required by Mercenary mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Mercenary mechanic if you find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Everything I need is here. Thank you.
Find %s for Mercenary Mechanics
%s are required by Mercenary mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Mercenary mechanic if you find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Everything I need is here. Thank you.
Clear Area of Mutants for Loners
Mutants are afoot. Hunt them down and clear the area. Afterwards, return to %s in %s for your reward.
Shh... Listen, hear that? Some mutants howling. Still gives me the chills after all this time. How about you go out there and take care of them? I'll make it worth your while.
Well done stalker!
Find the "%s" Artefact for Loner Trader
%s from %s wants you to find the %s artefact for him.
I usually don't buy artefacts from stalkers, but there is one in particular I would like to get my hands on. Do you want to try to get one for me?
I'm looking for the "%s" artefact. You ever seen one? I usually don't buy artefacts from stalkers, but I would like to get my hands on this one. If you can find it I will pay you well.
Good hunting stalker!
My Brother's Keeper
%s from %s wants you to kill a stalker who defected to the Military.

There's a guy; used to be a regular stalker just like anyone else around here. One day, some Military officers came and offered him a commission. The next thing we knew, he's found murdering his former brothers in cold blood! We cannot stand for that! Find this traitor and avenge the men he shot in the back.
Ah, you killed him? I think I'm gonna help myself to a drink. I'm sure we could all do with one...
Eliminate Mutant Threat for Loners

Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous for some of the locals. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
I've been looking for someone to help keep the area around here a bit safer by depopulating the various mutant lairs found in area. Would you like the job?
Thank you, stalker. The area will be much safer for others because of you. Here is your payment.
High Threat Assassination
%s from %s has a high value target that needs to be eliminated.
I have a dangerous threat that needs to be eliminated He will not be easy to get to but I promise to pay you well. Are you up for the job?
Excellent work stalker. Here is your payment.
Find %s for Loner Trader
%s from %s is looking for a specific firearm in moderate condition. Return to him if you find one.
One of my trappers is in the market for a specific firearm that I don't have available. Would you be able to track one down for me?
I need a %s. The trapper who wants it needs it to be at least in moderate condition. I can pay you well if you find one.
Ah, perfect. This will do nicely. Here is the money I promised you.
Collect %s for Loner Trader
%s from %s says he will pay well if I can bring him a %s.
I have a bounty out on a particular type of mutant. Are you interested?
Kill this mutant and bring me its %s and I will pay you well, stalker.
Ah, another threat eliminated and a new decoration for the camp. Well done, stalker.
Find %s for Loner Mechanics
%s are required by Loner mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Loner mechanic if you find any.
I need new tools, stalker, something that is hard to come by in the Zone. If you are interested in helping us out, I will tell you what we need.

Glad you asked, we would really like some new tools to works with, something that is very hard to come by in the Zone. For the beginning, find a new set of basic tools. Then, bring it back to any Loner mechanic and we will offer you a discount from here on out. Are you up for it?

Perfect! This is just what we need, stalker. If you need any of your equipment fine-tuned, don't hesitate to ask me to take a look at it. I will also inform the other mechanics to give you a discount.
Find %s for Loner Mechanics
%s are required by Loner mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Loner mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, bring it.
Whoa! You found quite a nice set of tools. Here's some money in return. I will talk to the other mechanics to give you a better discount.
Find %s for Loner Mechanics
%s are required by Loner mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Loner mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
We need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, bring it.
Nice! You found a very nice set of tools. Here's some money for your trouble. I also spoke with the other mechanics to give you a better discount.
Deliver PDA to Nimble
%s from %s needs you to deliver an encrypted PDA to Nimble in Zaton.
I want you to deliver this encrypted PDA to Nimble. Make sure you don't drop it or break it, okay?
Destroy a Military Helicopter for Clear Sky
%s from %s wants you to destroy a military attack helicopter.

The army has always been an annoyance to us, sending raiding parties to our outposts and such. But recently, they've been striking at us from above. See where I'm getting at? I want you to destroy one of their attack helicopters, that should make a dent in their forces. Think you could manage this? The reward will be good.
Escort the Scientists for Clear Sky %s
%s from %s has hired you to guide some scientists to a specific location for study. Once their research has been successfully conducted, return them safely to camp; where you will be compensated.

Scientists here in camp need an experienced stalker to lead them out into the field for study. Are you up for it? Your job is to keep them alive and guide them to their destination. Failure will give you a bad reputation around here.
Thank you stalker. You may have this as payment for your services.
Eliminate Mutant Threat for Clear Sky

Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous for some of the locals. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
Are you an avid hunter? We've been looking for someone to keep this place a bit safer by clearing out mutants in areas that our faction frequents. Would you like the job?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's somewhat safe around here once again. Thank you, stalker.
Eliminate Bandit Camp for Clear Sky
You have been tasked to eliminate the bandit threat within the area. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.

We have a big problem with bandits in the area. Those murderous thugs have been ambushing our camps outside the main base trying to take the territory over. It will deny us passage through many safe routes through this area; as long as they are in the vicinity. We need an experienced stalker who is not afraid to get his hands dirty. Will you help us out?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Thank you, stalker.
Wild Game Meat
%s from %s wants you to field dress freshly dead mutants and deliver %s.
If you are good with a rifle and not afraid of a few mutants, then I have a job for you. Are you interested?

Rations are running low and I need to keep everyone in camp's bellies full. Some of the guys bring me back a kill or two every now and again. But it's been slow lately - So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. I have my men who kill and process the meat, right here in this base. Keep in mind that getting the mutants all riled up makes the meat tough because of the adrenaline. Also, the lesser the bleeding, the better the meat tastes. So, just be careful with your shots, okay?
Great, you are a good hunter after all! I have payment for you.
Eliminate Military Camp for Clear Sky
You have been tasked to eliminate the military threat within the area. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.

We have a big problem with the military in the area. Those soldiers have been ambushing our camps outside the main base trying to take the territory over. It will deny us passage through many safe routes through this area; as long as they are in the vicinity. We need an experienced stalker who is not afraid to get his hands dirty. Will you help us out?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Thank you, stalker.
Find %s for Clear Sky Mechanics
%s are required by Clear Sky mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Clear Sky mechanic if you find any.

It's really hard to come by tools here in the Zone. It would make repairing and performing upgrades much easier and efficient for us if we could get our hands on some new tools. The task is for you to bring any box of tools you come across to any Clear Sky mechanics. If you are interested, I will tell you what we need. Are you up for this?

It's really hard to come by tools here in the Zone. It would make repairing and performing upgrades much easier and efficient for us if we could get our hands on some new tools. The task is for you to bring any box of tools you come across to any Clear Sky mechanics. A basic set of tools is what we currently need. Are you up for this?
Awesome, man! Here, let me throw some money at you. I also contacted the other mechanics to give you a discount.
Find %s for Clear Sky Mechanics
%s are required by Clear Sky mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Clear Sky mechanic if you find any.
I could really use more tools. You brought me some good shit last time but I need a higher quality set. If you are interested, I will tell you what I need.
Now we need a new set of advanced tools. You bring one, and we will offer you a bigger discount from here on out.
Awesome, man! You came through for us once again! Here, let me throw some money at you. The other mechanics will also offer you better prices.
Find %s for Clear Sky Mechanics
%s are required by Clear Sky mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Clear Sky mechanic if you find any.
I could really use more tools. You brought me some good shit last time but I need a higher quality set. If you are interested, I will tell you what I need.
Now we need a new set of expert tools. That should be everything we need for now. You bring one, and we will offer you an even bigger discount from here on out.
Awesome, man! You came through for us once again! Here, let me throw some money at you. The other mechanics will also offer you better prices.
Yeah, I've been waiting for this. Thanks. Here's your payment:
Repel Assault for Freedom
Intercept the assault squad closing in on a Freedom camp. Report back to %s in %s once you have cleared the area.
Forces hostile to Freedom are moving in on one of our camps. I need someone capable to repel the incursion. Are you the man for the job?
The task is done? Good.
Recapture Territory for Freedom
You have been tasked to defend a faction territory. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
I have an important mission if you are willing. Duty has taken over one of our camps and I need an infiltrator to reclaim it.
Excellent. Well done.
Assassinate Monolith Member for Freedom
%s from %s has tasked you with finding and eliminating a member of Monolith.

I have a very dangerous mission. I've asked for volunteers but so far no one has stepped forward. Monolith forces keep breaking through our blockade. I want to take the fight to them for once. I need someone to enter their territory and take out a certain member of their faction to send them a message. What do you think? Are you the biggest daredevil in this camp?
Ah, you survived! Man, you've got a set on you. Great job.
Assassinate Target for Freedom
%s from %s has tasked you with finding and eliminating a target.
There is a certain individual who has been very loud in his opposition to Freedom and needs to be quieted. Are you any good at shutting people up?
Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised:
Find %s for Freedom
%s from %s has asked you to find a specific firearm. Return to him when you find what he is looking for.
With Duty to the south of us and Monolith to the north, we are cut off. Our weaponry is wearing out and we need replacements. Have you ever done any gun running?
We could really use a new %s. If you can find us one in moderate condition I would be willing to pay a good price for it.
Well done. This will go a long way in helping us defend the Zone. Here is the payment I promised.
Wild Game Meat
%s from %s wants you to field dress freshly dead mutants to collect %s.
I have just the job for you, man, if you are not afraid of a few mutants. Are you interested?

Some of the guys bring me back a kill or two every now and again. But it's been slow lately - So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. Our cook kills and processes the meat, right here in this camp.
Great, you are a good hunter! I have payment for you.
Clear Area of Mutants for Freedom
Hunt these mutants down and clear the area.
I'd like someone to eliminate the mutants at this location, they've been causing trouble to our guys. I am willing to pay a good price for it. Will you take it on?
Well done, man! Here is the reward I promised.
Find %s for Freedom Mechanics
%s are required by Freedom mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Freedom mechanic if you find any.
Yo, man. Are you interested in doing a job for me? I need specific tools to operate on weapons.

Yeah dude, we need a bunch of new tools to work with but these jackasses prefer to get high instead of helping us find new replacements. Find a new set of basic tools, then bring it to any Freedom mechanic you can. Can we count on you, man?
Thanks, man! I knew there was a reason we asked you. You look like a man who can get shit done. We will give you a discount as a reward.
Find %s for Freedom Mechanics
%s are required by Freedom mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Freedom mechanic if you find any.
Haha, I hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
Now we need a new set of advanced tools. If you can bring one, we will all be grateful.
You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks, man. We will offer you better prices from now on as a reward.
Find %s for Freedom Mechanics
%s are required by Freedom mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Freedom mechanic if you find any.
Haha, I hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
Now we need a new set of expert tools. That's the last thing we need for now, I promise. If you can bring some back we will be grateful.
Thanks, man. We will give you a discount as a reward.
Conquer the Enemy
You have been tasked to clear an area for the good of the almighty Monolith. Report back to Rabbit after the job is done.
I have an important mission for you. You must journey into the Zone and clear the area so that our forces may move in. Are you ready?
The task is done? Good. Praise Monolith.
Kill the Planner
A stalker is trying to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. %s from %s ordered you to kill him.
There are many threats to the great works of the Zone. There is one who is once again planning to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. He must be stopped. You must find him and destroy him.
You have done well. The Collective is pleased.
Find %s for Monolith
%s from %s has requested a new rifle to add to the Monolith arsenal.
We grow more powerful every day. We need more weaponry to continue to achieve our goals. You must find a new weapon for us so we may continue to grow our arsenal.
Find a new %s and bring it to me.
This will do well.
Wild Game Meat
%s from %s ordered you to hunt for and field dress %s.
Our provisions run low. You must go out into the Zone and hunt for meat so that your Monolith brothers may feast.
Hunt for and bring us %s. Remember these creatures are a gift of the Zone. Kill them swiftly and give thanks. Return the meat to me when you have succeeded.
You have succeeded in your task. Well done.
Procure %s for Monolith
%s from %s wants you to procure %s.
You must procure more supplies for us so we may continue our great works.
Retrieve %s and bring them to me.
You have done well to serve Monolith.
Find the "%s" Artefact for Monolith
%s from %s wants you to find the %s artefact.
We must find another artefact to give as an offering. Will you help serve the good of the Monolith?
Find a "%s" artefact. Bring it to me when you have succeeded so we may conduct the ceremony.
You serve the Monolith well. Join us tonight in the ceremonial offering. There will be chanting.
Find %s for Monolith Mechanics
%s are required by Monolith mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Monolith mechanic if you find any.
I need you to do something for me. I need specific tools to tune our weapons.
Okay, we need new tools to tune our weapons with better efficiency. Find a new set of basic tools. Go, now.
You've done well. We are giving you a discount as a reward.
Find %s for Monolith Mechanics
%s are required by Monolith mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Monolith mechanic if you find any.
I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
We need more tools. Find a new set of advanced tools. Go, now.
Good. You've brought what we needed. We are giving you a discount as a reward.
Find %s for Monolith Mechanics
%s are required by Monolith mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Monolith mechanic if you find any.
I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
We need more tools. Find a new set of expert tools. That should contain what we need for now. Now, go.
Good. You've brought what we needed. We are giving you a discount as a reward.
Escort the Scientists
%s from %s has hired you to guide some researchers to a specific location for study. Once their research has been successfully conducted, return them safely to camp.
We need an experienced stalker to lead a few of our the colleagues out into the field for study. Are you up for the task?
Thank you for your protection, stalker. Please, take this as a token of our gratitude.
Find the "%s" Artefact for Ecologists
%s from %s asked you retrieve the %s artefact.
We are looking for certain kinds of artefacts. If you are interested, I will tell you what we need.
I need you to bring us back a "%s" artefact. You ever heard of it? We can pay you pretty well in return.
Great! You've found exactly what we are looking for.
Find %s for Ecologists
%s from %s asked you to retrieve a tissue sample from a %s.
I need an experienced stalker or a mutant hunter. Is that somebody you?
The scientists need to collect tissue samples from a %s. I don't care how you get it, just make sure it's fresh. Get here as soon as you recover what they need from the mutant.
Thank you, sir. This will help immensely in our research.
Find %s for Ecolog Mechanics
%s are required by Ecolog mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Ecolog mechanic if you find any.
I have a proposition for you. If you can bring me some new tools, you will receive payment. Are you up for it?

Alright. You know where the eggheads turn to when one of their machinery breaks down, right? That's right, to us. Problem is, our tools are getting pretty old and rusty and we are going to need replacements soon. Find some %s for a start. Bring it to any of our mechanics when you get your hands on a set. For each set of tools you bring, we will give you a discount. Do you want to give it a shot?
Right, on. This is what we've been looking for, thanks!
Find %s for Ecolog Mechanics
%s are required by Ecolog mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Ecolog mechanic if you find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Everything I need is here. Thank you.
Find %s for Ecolog Mechanics
%s are required by Ecolog mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Ecolog mechanic if you find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Everything I need is here. Thank you.
Eliminate Target for Renegades
Find and eliminate the target then return to %s from %s for payment.

There are many people in the Zone who have rubbed me the wrong way or shown me disrespect. Some of these pricks either owe me money or fucked up some deal. These people are nothing but rats that need stomped out. If you are up for the task, I will give you their information so that you can track them through GPS.
Great work! Here's a little something for your trouble:
Eliminate Mutant Threat for Renegades
Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.

We've been looking for someone with enough balls to clear out mutants in a few places. Stalkers aren't coming around here because they are too afraid. If we don't do something about it we won't have anyone left to 'borrow' any goods from, then we will have to move out of this territory.
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Eliminate Enemy Threat for Renegades
You have been tasked to eliminate a territorial threat within the area. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
Bitches are moving into our territory. The boss gave me orders to recruit a low life with enough balls to reclaim some of these camps. What do you say? Do you have enough hair on your chest?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Hit Man
%s from %s has contracted you to run a hit. Find and eliminate the target then return to him for payment.
I have a list of people who have rubbed me the wrong way. I want you to rub them out. What do you say?
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Find %s for Renegade Mechanics
%s are required by Renegade mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Renegade mechanic if you find any.
I'm in desperate need of new tools, man. I can't do anything with the rusty shit I have and I'm running out of gun oil. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.

We need better tools, yo. It's pretty fucking hard to search for them when every motherfucker in the Zone is shooting us on sight. For now, we just need a new set of basic tools. You find one, bring it back to any of our mechanics and we will even offer you a discount from here on out. You up for it, dude?
Perfect! This is just what we need, man. I will talk to the other mechanics to give you a discount.
Find %s for Renegade Mechanics
%s are required by Renegade mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Renegade mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, here is some money. I spoke to the other mechanics to give you an even bigger discount.
Find %s for Renegade Mechanics
%s are required by Renegade mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Renegade mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. That should contain everything we need for now. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, now we have everything we need. We'll give you another discount for your work.
Conquer the Enemy
You have been tasked to clear an area for the cause of the Sinners. Report back after the job is done.
I have an important mission for you. You must journey into the Zone and clear the area so that our forces may move in. Are you ready?
The task is done? Good. Praise Sin.
Kill the Planner
A stalker is trying to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. %s from %s ordered you to kill him.
There are many threats to the great works of the Zone. There is one who is once again planning to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. He must be stopped. You must find him and destroy him.
You have done well. The Collective is pleased.
Find %s for Sin
%s from %s has requested a new rifle to add to the Sinners arsenal.
We grow more powerful every day. We need more weaponry to continue to achieve our goals. You must find a new weapon for us so we may continue to grow our arsenal.
Find a new %s and bring it to me.
This will do well.
Wild Game Meat
%s from %s ordered you to hunt for and field dress %s.
Our provisions run low. You must go out into the Zone and hunt for meat so that your Sin brothers may feast.
Hunt for and bring us %s. Remember these creatures are a gift of the Zone. Kill them swiftly and give thanks. Return the meat to me when you have succeeded.
You have succeeded in your task. Well done.
Procure %s for Sin
%s from %s wants you to procure %s.
You must procure more supplies for us so we may continue our great works.
Retrieve %s and bring them to me.
You have done well to serve our cause.
Find the "%s" Artefact for Sin
%s from %s wants you to find the %s artefact.
We must find another artefact to give as an offering. Will you help serve the good of the Sinners?
Find a "%s" artefact. Bring it to me when you have succeeded so we may conduct the ceremony.
You serve our cause well. Join us tonight in the ceremonial offering. There will be chanting.
Find %s for Sin Mechanics
%s are required by Sin mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Sin mechanic if you find any.
I need you to do something for me. I need specific tools to tune our weapons.
Okay, we need new tools to tune our weapons with better efficiency. Find a new set of basic tools. Go, now.
You've done well. We are giving you a discount as a reward.
Find %s for Sin Mechanics
%s are required by Sin mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Sin mechanic if you find any.
I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
We need more tools. Find a new set of advanced tools. Go, now.
Good. You've brought what we needed. We are giving you a discount as a reward.
Find %s for Sin Mechanics
%s are required by Sin mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Sin mechanic if you find any.
I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
We need more tools. Find a new set of expert tools. That should contain what we need for now. Now, go.
Good. You've brought what we needed. We are giving you a discount as a reward.
Find %s for UNISG Mechanics
%s are required by UNISG mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any UNISG mechanic if you find any.
I have a proposition for you. If you can bring me some new tools, you will receive payment. Are you up for it?

Good. We've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some oil and tools that we need to do work on firearms. We will pay you for one of these toolkits if you can bring a full set back to any of our mechanics, including me. For every new set of tools you bring, we will reduce the prices for our services as a token of our gratitude. So, what do you say? You gonna help us?.
Right, on. This is what we've been looking for, thanks!

Everything I need is here. Thank you.
